description: The Bluetooth Keyboard with Removable PU Leather Case Cover and Stand was designed with soft keys that deliver very clean and precise keystrokes that will improve your typing speed and accuracy. The advanced technology, versatility and long life battery packed into this durable, stylish, portable and light weight PU leather case will amaze and delight.Product Specifications:Dimensions (LWH):	10.8 inches, 7.7 inches, 1.3 inchesWeight: 			1.4 poundsCell type: 			Lithium PolymerInitial Charge Time:	4 HoursBattery Capacity: 	450mAhUsage Time:		Up to 60 HoursCompatibility:Most 7" ~ 8" Tablets, iPad Mini, Google Nexus 7, Kindle Fire HD, Kindle Fire HD 7, ASUS MeMO Pad, Tesco Hudl, etc.Package Contents:Bluetooth Keyboard with Removable PU Leather Case Cover and StandOne USB power cableUser ManualWhy Choose OXABecause we believe that our customers deserve a Quality Product with Advanced Functionality at a Fair Price.When you review the features and functionality that are designed into each and every OXA Product, we guarantee that you will be delighted or you can return the product for a full refund up to 30 days after purchase.At OXA "More Juice - More Life" is not just a slogan. It is our commitment to you that we will deliver High Quality Products and Support for those Products to our customers before and after the sale.
title: OXA Detachable Wireless Bluetooth Keyboard with Retractable Buckle Case for iPad Mini, Google Nexus 7, Kindle Fire HD, Kindle Fire HD 7, ASUS MeMO Pad, Tesco Hudl and More 7-8 Inch Tablet PC - Black
